mcp_servers.name: local_mock_server
mcp_servers.description: A local server providing mock tools for development.

hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if [[ "$file_path" == *.js || "$file_path" == *.ts || "$file_path" == *.py || "$file_path" == *.md ]]; then npx prettier --write "$file_path"; fi; }
